name: Gakkou Deatta Kowai Hanashi S
overview: Gakkou Deatta Kowai Hanashi (aka School Terror Story) is a Survival Horror text-based adventure game or visual novel for the Super Famicom that was released in 1995 by Banpresto. The game features pictures of real Japanese actors/models, and CAMERA J. The game is a compilation of about 50 scary stories which is played in the setting of a school. The graphics bring up a feeling of fear by using on-the-spot photography. Since it uses multi-stories, you can enjoy those stories any number of times. Gakkou Deatta Kowai Hanashi S is the Playstation version of that SNES game featuring enhanced graphics and sounds and new fmv sequences.
